mapper.sql: select t.rec_id, t.customer_id, t.product_quality, t.product_design, t.product_aftersale, t.product_memory, t.rec_status, t.rec_person, t.rec_time, t.rec_updateperson, t.rec_updatetime, u.nick_name as user_name from d_customer_evaluate t left join sys_user u on t.rec_person=u.user_name
mapper.select:
where t.rec_status='1'
and t.customer_id like concat('%',#{customer_id},'%')
and t.product_quality like concat('%',#{product_quality},'%')
and t.product_design like concat('%',#{product_design},'%')
and t.product_aftersale like concat('%',#{product_aftersale},'%')
and t.product_memory like concat('%',#{product_memory},'%')
